titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-Councell assembled, with the annexed papers: presented to the Right Honorable the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: with the answer of both Houses to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the Honourable city of London,

notesStmt.note: The annexed papers are dated: July 5, 1648 and July 17, 1648.
The answer to the petition is dated: July 22, 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
